      • standardAddUser

        private void standardAddUser(java.lang.String jsonBody,
                   int expectedStatus,
                   int expectedNewUserNumber,
                   java.lang.String token)
        Simple useful function that generates "add user" test from the parameters.
        Parameters:
        jsonBody - : the request json body
        expectedStatus - : the expected Http response status
        expectedNewUserNumber - : the expected number of users in the table after running this test
        token - : the string corresponding to the current connected user (or null if there is not)

      • standardUpdateUser

        private void standardUpdateUser(java.lang.String jsonBody,
                      java.lang.Integer userId,
                      int expectedStatus,
                      boolean checkNewValues,
                      java.lang.String expectedNewFirstName,
                      java.lang.String expectedNewLastName,
                      java.lang.String expectedNewPassword,
                      java.lang.String token)
        Simple useful function that generates "update user" test from the parameters.
        Parameters:
        jsonBody - : the request json body
        userId - : the id of the user to update
        expectedStatus - : the expected Http response status
        checkNewValues - : check or not the new values (name, description ...)
        token - : the string corresponding to the current connected user (or null if there is not)
